nodes.text: Wicked was a musical playing at the Galaxies Opera House in 19 BBY. A sign advertising the show was displayed outside of the opera house during a performance of Squid Lake attended by Palpatine and Anakin Skywalker. The sign depicted an Imperial stormtrooper whispering into the ear of a green-skinned Palpatine.

This is a reference to the musical Wicked. In Tag & Bink: Revenge of the Clone Menace, there is a poster resembling Wicked's, but instead of the show's characters Elphaba and Glinda, it shows a green Palpatine and a stormtrooper.
